EmailTemplate.name: 9b.1 Feedback to summer staff: invite to apply again
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback from your role this summer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Many thanks for your contribution to NCS with The Challenge. Following the feedback received on your performance, we would like to invite you to re-apply for the same role of {!Job_Application__c.Recommendation_for_next_year__c} for 2014.
We feel that it is important to continue to improve our roles year on year; and in order to improve the quality of our programme, changes have been made to some of the roles so we will require a re-assessment for you to apply for this position.
Please follow the link below and complete the application form. An assessment date will be sent to you in due course.*
http://thechallenge.force.com/TCN/New_Job_Application
Thank you for your ongoing interest in NCS with The Challenge.
